h2. Main Office
<hr>
{{html:
<form class="form-horizontal">
<fieldset>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Project Name</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="Main Office" class="input-xlarge">
    
  </div>
</div>
<hr>
<!-- Multiple Checkboxes -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Manage Users</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-0">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-0" value="john@cloudscalers.com">
      john@cloudscalers.com [Admin]
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-1">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-1" value="claudia@cloudscalers.com">
      claudia@cloudscalers.com
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-2">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-2" value="brad@cloudscalers.com">
      brad@cloudscalers.com
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-3">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-3" value="jennifer@cloudscalers.com">
      jennifer@cloudscalers.com
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-4">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-4" value="heather@cloudscalers.com">
      heather@cloudscalers.com
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Button -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="singlebutton"></label>
  <div class="controls">
    <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn ">Edit users</button>
  </div>
</div>
<hr>
<!-- Appended Input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Add User</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-xlarge" placeholder="placeholder" type="text">
      <span class="add-on">Add</span>
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Multiple Checkboxes (inline) -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Select User Type</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="checkbox inline" for="checkboxes-0">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-0" value="User">
      User
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox inline" for="checkboxes-1">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-1" value="Administrator">
      Administrator
    </label>
  </div>
</div>
<hr>
<!-- Appended Input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext">Storage</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <div class="input-append">
      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="140 GB" type="text">
      <span class="add-on">Update</span>
    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>
<hr>
<!-- Multiple Checkboxes -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="checkboxes">Data Locations</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-0">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-0" value="Ghent, Belgium">
      Ghent, Belgium
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-1">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-1" value="Bruges, Belgium">
      Bruges, Belgium
    </label>
    <label class="checkbox" for="checkboxes-2">
      <input type="checkbox" name="checkboxes" id="checkboxes-2" value="Lenoir, NC, USA">
      Lenoir, NC, USA
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="appendedtext"># MS Office Licenses</label>
  <div class="controls">

      <input id="appendedtext" name="appendedtext" class="input-mini" placeholder="5" type="text">

  </div>
</div>

    </div>
    
  </div>
</div>
-->
<!-- Button -->
<div class="form-actions">

    <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">Update Desktop Bucket</button>

</div>

</fieldset>
</form>
